title: Google, when are you going to fix the issue with Pixel Phone batteries shutting down at 30%?!
content: Google, when are you going to fix the issue with Pixel Phone batteries shutting down at 30%?! This issue is SUPER frustrating, especially when I am in the middle of something, and my Pixel shuts down, wiping out my work! I am not the only person to whom this happens. Why won't Google fix this issue?!
